question:
As part of budget planning, management wants a report of AWS billed items listed by user. The data will be used to create department budgets. A solutions architect needs to determine the most efficient way to obtain this report information.

Which solution meets these requirements?

options.A: Run a query with Amazon Athena to generate the report.
options.B: Create a report in Cost Explorer and download the report.
options.C: Access the bill details from the billing dashboard and download the bill.
options.D: Modify a cost budget in AWS Budgets to alert with Amazon Simple Email Service (Amazon SES).

explanation: AWS Cost Explorer provides cost reports that can be filtered and grouped by various dimensions including user/IAM identity. Reports can be downloaded for budget planning. Athena requires setting up Cost and Usage Reports first. Billing dashboard shows account-level bills, not user-level breakdown. AWS Budgets is for alerts, not generating detailed reports.
